item.title: GoldenDict++ Web History and Cache
item.description:
[GoldenDict,划词翻译,Web,Cache]
How to optimise the speed of access to web type dictionaries and limit their memory consumption by setting the web cache used by GoldenDict++

item.title: GoldenDict++Web缓存设置
item.description:
[GoldenDict,划词翻译,Web,缓存]
如何通过设置GoldenDict++划词翻译使用的Web缓存来优化Web类型词典的访问速度并限制其占用的内存
